title: i have problem with the old and the new client
body:
1- after upgrading my old legacy client to the new one
every time i open the legacy client it keeps giving me this message:

                                      Update Failed
unspecified error. please check the logs for more information

and it doesn't work.

2- the new client (in out-game) doesn't save or apply settings

replies.body:
For the first issue, I'd say there must be some kind of corrupted file somewhere that is preventing your client from being able to update properly. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the reinstall option checked to make sure you have a fresh install of the game. 

If your settings aren't saving, it might be that your config settings have gone a little wonky. We can try manually resetting that as well to force it to save again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if those steps weren't able to help and we can take a closer look for you!
